pubspec.name: flutter_markdown
pubspec.description: A Markdown renderer for Flutter. Create rich text output, including text styles, tables, links, and more, from plain text data formatted with simple Markdown tags.

pubspec.name: flutter_markdown
pubspec.author: Flutter Authors <flutter-dev@googlegroups.com>
